data.title: License denials, citations, and disciplinary actions
data.excerpt: The table below includes information related to license denials, citations, fines, suspensions, and revocations issued by DCC. An Order of Decision pursuant to the Administrative Procedure Act has not been issued for these matters. Compliance actions marked with an asterisk (“*”) are currently on appeal.  Review information related to those decisions and view the specific […]
